topic: Weekly Premier League post-match analysis and key developments across teams.
evaluation: The selected articles form a highly coherent and time-continuous series of weekly post-match analyses, titled '10 talking points from the weekend's action'. These articles provide consistent backward-looking insights into Premier League performances, tactical shifts (e.g., Guardiola, Arteta's strategies), and evolving team narratives (e.g., Arsenal's mentality change). They are ideal for synthesis to track week-on-week developments. The remaining articles were de-noised as they represent distinct, albeit continuous, series of pre-match previews ('10 things to look out for') and detailed team news, which, while relevant to football, do not align with the narrative style and temporal focus of the chosen post-match analysis series for a single, synthesizable story.
